vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.10;
son of: Bilhan (H1092H);
brother of: Jeush (H3266H), Benjamin (H1144H), Ehud (H0164H), Chenaanah (H3668H), Zethan (H2133) and Tarshish (H8659I)
§ Ahishahar = "my brother is dawn" or "brother of the dawn"
a Benjamite
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Bilhán; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞希沙哈 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是黎明" 或 "黎明的兄弟"
一位便雅憫人 (代上 7:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚希沙哈 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我兄弟是黎明" 或 "黎明的兄弟"
一位便雅悯人 (代上 7:10)
